tasks.command: git add . && git commit -m "Update labs" && git push origin main

tasks.command: echo 'Your deployed labs:' && for i in {01..10}; do echo "Lab ${i}: https://wxfreekj.github.io/lab${i}-student"; done

tasks.command: git add . && git commit -m 'Initial commit: All 10 labs with auto-deployment'

tasks.command: git remote add origin https://github.com/wxfreekj/esci240-labs.git && git branch -M main && git push -u origin main
